import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Segment, Image, Grid, Dimmer, Button, Modal, Divider} from 'semantic-ui-react' import Skills from './skills' const Project = props => { const [active, setActive] = useState(false) const [openModel, setOpenModel] = useState(true) const handleHide = () => {setActive(true)} const handShow = () => {setActive(false)} return( <> handleHide()} onMouseLeave={()=> handShow()}>

{props.text}

setOpenModel(false)} onOpen={() => setOpenModel(true)} open={openModel} trigger={} > {props.text} {props.description}

Skills

{console.log(props.skills)} {props.skills.map(skill => ( ))} ) } export default Project
